SELECT ROUT_ID ,REP_ROUT_ID ,REP_ROUT_NM ,ROUT_NM ,ROUT_LEN FROM BMS_ROUT_MST WHERE DEL_YN != 'Y'
AND REP_ROUT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY REP_ROUT_NM

SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(A.OPER_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') OPER_DT ,A.REP_ROUT_ID ,A.ROUT_ID ,CONCAT(A.STAT_H, '시') AS STAT_H ,AVG(AVRG_SPD) AS AVRG_SPD ,MAX_SPD ,MIN_SPD ,B.ROUT_NM
DATE_FORMAT(DATE(A.OPER_DT), '%Y-%m-%d') OPER_DT ,AVG(A.AVRG_SPD) AS AVRG_SPD ,A.ROUT_ID ,A.REP_ROUT_ID ,B.ROUT_NM
MONTH(A.OPER_DT) AS OPER_DT ,AVG(A.AVRG_SPD) AS AVRG_SPD ,A.ROUT_ID ,A.REP_ROUT_ID ,B.ROUT_NM
FROM BRT_ROUT_AVER_OPER_SP_STAT A LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST B ON A.ROUT_ID = B.ROUT_ID WHERE A.ROUT_ID IN
#{item}
AND DATE_FORMAT(A.OPER_DT, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #{F_DATE} AND #{L_DATE}
GROUP BY OPER_DT, ROUT_ID, A.STAT_H ORDER BY OPER_DT, ROUT_ID, A.STAT_H
GROUP BY OPER_DT, A.ROUT_ID ORDER BY A.ROUT_ID, OPER_DT
GROUP BY A.ROUT_ID ORDER BY A.ROUT_ID, A.OPER_DT

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE(A.OPER_DT), '%Y-%m-%d') OPER_DT ,AVG(A.AVRG_SPD) AS AVRG_SPD ,A.ROUT_ID ,A.REP_ROUT_ID ,B.ROUT_NM FROM BRT_ROUT_AVER_OPER_SP_STAT A LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST B ON A.ROUT_ID = B.ROUT_ID WHERE A.ROUT_ID IN
#{item}
AND DATE_FORMAT(A.OPER_DT, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #{F_DATE} AND #{L_DATE}
GROUP BY A.ROUT_ID, A.OPER_SN
GROUP BY A.ROUT_ID, A.ALLOC_NO
GROUP BY A.REP_ROUT_ID
GROUP BY OPER_DT, A.ROUT_ID ORDER BY A.ROUT_ID, OPER_DT

SELECT MONTH(A.OPER_DT) AS OPER_DT ,AVG(A.AVRG_SPD) AS AVRG_SPD ,A.ROUT_ID ,A.REP_ROUT_ID ,B.ROUT_NM FROM BRT_ROUT_AVER_OPER_SP_STAT A LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST B ON A.ROUT_ID = B.ROUT_ID WHERE A.ROUT_ID IN
#{item}
AND DATE_FORMAT(A.OPER_DT, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #{F_DATE} AND #{L_DATE}
GROUP BY A.ROUT_ID, A.OPER_SN
GROUP BY A.ROUT_ID, A.ALLOC_NO
GROUP BY A.REP_ROUT_ID
GROUP BY A.REP_ROUT_ID ORDER BY A.OPER_DT, A.ROUT_ID
